lead_paragraph: Tech companies, civil liberties groups and media organizations are planning to back Microsoft’s resistance to government attempts to snoop on customers.

headline.print_headline: Microsoft’s Legal Challenge to Government Secrecy Wins Dozens of Supporters
headline.main: Microsoft’s Challenge to Government Secrecy Wins Dozens of Supporters

snippet: Tech companies, civil liberties groups and media organizations are planning to back Microsoft’s resistance to government attempts to snoop on customers....
abstract: Technology companies, civil liberties groups and media organizations file legal briefs supporting Microsoft's case against Justice Dept; lawsuit filed by software firm accuses agency of overusing provision that prevents it from telling customers their electronic communications have been given to law enforcement.
